Method Detail

isZOrdered

public boolean isZOrdered()
Get the Z ordering state for this layer.

Returns:
current Z ordering state. True if enabled (default).

setZOrdered

public void setZOrdered(boolean zOrdered)
Set the Z ordering state for this layer. When enabled, markers are ordered based on distance from the camera (using camera relative Z-coordinate) and layer ordering is not preserved. This forces the layer to be in "3D" mode. When disabled, markers are ordered as normal elements (points, lines, polygons), this is the preferred mode for normal 2D views as overlapping markers cause less visual artifacts.

Parameters:
zOrdered - new Z ordering state. Default is enabled (true).
